vernac_cmds: Fixpoint eval (n : nat) (u : term) := match u with | var n => None | lambda s => Some (lambda s) | app s t => match n with | 0 => None | S n => match eval n s, eval n t with | Some (lambda s), Some t => eval n (subst s 0 t) | _ , _ => None end end end.
Lemma eval_S n s t : eval n s = Some t -> eval (S n) s = Some t.
revert s t; induction n; intros; cbn in H; repeat (destruct _ eqn:_; subst; try congruence; eauto).
remember (S n) as n'; cbn; subst.
Lemma eval_step s s' t n : s ≻ s' -> eval n s' = Some t -> eval (S n) s = Some t.
revert s s' t; induction n; intros.
inv H; repeat (destruct _ eqn:_; subst; try congruence).
cbn; now rewrite E, E0, E1.
Lemma evaluates_eval s t : evaluates s t -> exists n, eval n s = Some t.
Lemma eval_evaluates n s t : eval n s = Some t -> evaluates s t.
revert s t; induction n; intros.
Lemma equiv_eval s t : lam t -> s ≡ t -> exists n, eval n s = Some t.
Lemma eval_equiv s s' n : eval n s = Some s' -> s ≡ s'.
Lemma eval_lambda n s t : eval n s = Some t -> lam t.
Lemma computable_eva s : eva s -> { v | s ▷ v }.
assert (exists n v, eval n s = Some v) by (destruct H as (? & ? % evaluates_eval); firstorder).
Lemma dec_pdec p : decidable p -> forall x, p x \/ ~ p x.
Lemma decidable_dec p : decidable p -> exists f, forall s, f s = true <-> p s.
Proof with try tauto; try (eexists; reflexivity).
exists (fun s => let (v, _) := H s in if decision (v = T) then true else false).
assert (x ≡ T) by now rewrite <- e, <- H4.
Fixpoint unenc s := match s with | lambda (lambda 1) => Some 0 | lambda (lambda (app 0 s)) => match unenc s with Some n => Some (S n) | x=>x end | _ => None end.
Lemma unenc_correct m : (unenc (enc m)) = Some m.
induction m; simpl; now try rewrite IHm.
Lemma unenc_correct2 t n : unenc t = Some n -> enc n = t.
eapply (size_induction (f := size) (p := (fun t => forall n, unenc t = Some n -> enc n = t))).
destruct t; try now inv H.
destruct t; try now inv H.
destruct t; try now inv H.
destruct n0; try now inv H.
destruct n0; try now inv H.
destruct t1; try now inv H.
destruct n0; try now inv H.

Fixpoint decode (s : term) := match s with | lambda (lambda (lambda (app (var 2) t))) => match unenc t with Some n => Some (var n) | None => None end | lambda (lambda (lambda (app (app (var 1) s) t))) => match decode s, decode t with | Some s, Some t => Some (s t) | _, _ => None end | lambda (lambda (lambda (app (var 0) s))) => match decode s with | Some s => Some (lambda s) | None => None end | _ => None end.
Lemma decode_correct t : (decode (tenc t)) = Some t.
Lemma decode_correct2 s t : decode s = Some t -> tenc t = s.
eapply (size_induction (f := size) (p := (fun s => forall t, decode s = Some t -> tenc t = s))).
destruct s; try now inv H.
destruct s; try now inv H.
destruct s; try now inv H.
destruct s; try now inv H.
destruct s1; try now inv H.
destruct n as [ | [ | [] ] ]; try now inv H.
eapply IHs in E; try omega.
destruct s1_1; try now inv H.
destruct n as [ | [] ]; try now inv H.
eapply IHs in E1; try omega.
eapply IHs in E2; try omega.
Lemma L_computable_computable u : (forall s, exists t, u (tenc s) ▷ tenc t) -> { f | forall s, u (tenc s) ▷ tenc (f s)}.
exists (fun s => match decode (proj1_sig (computable_eva (H0 s))) with Some t => t | None => 0 end).

command: revert s t; induction n; intros; cbn in H; repeat (destruct _ eqn:_; subst; try congruence; eauto).
remember (S n) as n'; cbn; subst.
revert s s' t; induction n; intros.
inv H; repeat (destruct _ eqn:_; subst; try congruence).
cbn; now rewrite E, E0, E1.
revert s t; induction n; intros.
assert (exists n v, eval n s = Some v) by (destruct H as (? & ? % evaluates_eval); firstorder).
induction m; simpl; now try rewrite IHm.
eapply (size_induction (f := size) (p := (fun s => forall t, decode s = Some t -> tenc t = s))).
destruct s; try now inv H.
destruct s; try now inv H.
destruct s; try now inv H.
destruct s; try now inv H.
destruct s1; try now inv H.
destruct n as [ | [ | [] ] ]; try now inv H.
eapply IHs in E; try omega.
destruct s1_1; try now inv H.
destruct n as [ | [] ]; try now inv H.
eapply IHs in E1; try omega.
eapply IHs in E2; try omega.
exists (fun s => match decode (proj1_sig (computable_eva (H0 s))) with Some t => t | None => 0 end).
